A. A) The South Indian miner gifted a diamond to the king.
B. B) The king received a diamond from the British viceroy.
C. C) The ship sank during the sea voyage to Britain.
D. D) The British viceroy was involved in the diamond transaction.
Correct Answer: A) The South Indian miner gifted a diamond to the king., C) The ship sank during the sea voyage to Britain.
